subtitle: These rissoles have a wonderful savoury nutty flavour and are delicious served with a flavoursome home-made tomato sauce.

method.text: Heat the sunflower oil. Gently fry the onion, garlic and mushrooms for 5-8 min until softened.
Add the vegetable stock and yeast extract to the fried mixture and simmer for 2-3 min.
Mix together the remaining dry ingredients in a bowl. Add the fried mushroom mixture. Stir until well combined. Season to taste.
Shape the mixture into rissoles. Place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Chill for about 30 min.
Spread the breadcrumbs on a plate. Dip each rissole in egg, drain well then coat in the breadcrumbs.
Heat a little oil in a frying pan and fry the rissoles in batches for 2-3 min on each side or until golden and heated through. Serve while warm.

title: Nutty mushrooms and herb rissoles
